JOIN LD GOLD TO SKIP ALL ADS

LivePlay is absolutely legal and contain only links to other sites on the Internet （youtube, ZStream, Dizimag, TheVideo,etc). It does not host or upload any videos, films or media files. LivePlay simply aggregates links in a convenient, user-friendly interface. LivePlay is not responsible for the accuracy, compliance, copyright, legality, decency, or any other aspect of the content of other linked sites. If you have any legal issues, please contact the appropriate media file owners or host sites. Any legal issues regarding the free online tv, tv shows and movies on this application should be taken up with the actual file hosts and providers themselves, as we’re not affiliated with them.


In case of copyright infringement, please directly contact the responsible parties. LivePlay operates as a search engine of TV, TV Shows and movies content found publicly on the internet, in principle conducting in the same way as Google. However, LivePlay strongly believes in the protection of intellectual property and would be willing to assist when possible and applicable. LivePlay does not accept responsibility or contents hosted on third party websites, nor do we upload videos ourselves or encourage others to do so. The videos are streamed directly form the third-party video sharing services mentioned above. All other trademarks, logos, and images are the property of their respective and rightful owners.


Use LivePlay at your own risk.
Parental control:\nTo setup,please type in your password and confirm. If not required, please press cancel
